= Amazon Relational Data Service (RDS) =

== Create a MySQL Database ==

*Command*
{{{
./rds-create-db-instance petclinic-clc -s 5 -c db.m1.small -e MySQL -p petclinic -u petclinic --db-security-groups default --db-name petclinic --port 3306 --backup-retention-period 0
}}}

*Output*
{{{
DBINSTANCE  petclinic-clc  db.m1.small  mysql  5  petclinic  creating  0  ****  n  5.1.57 general-public-license
      SECGROUP  default  active
      PARAMGRP  default.mysql5.1  in-sync
}}}
Please note that the server ip address is not yet known !


== Describe Instances ==

*Command*
{{{
./rds-describe-db-instances petclinic-clc
}}}
